Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.qoppa.pdfSecure.PDFSecure.clearSecurity(String) 
    com.qoppa.pdf.TextPosition.getEnclosingShape()
    This method is redundant. Replaced by get by getViewSelectionShape().
    com.qoppa.pdf.SigningInformation.getJCEProvider() 
    com.qoppa.pdf.dom.IPDFDocument.getMagnification()
    Use getOpenAction()
    com.qoppa.pdfProcess.PDFDocument.getMagnification()
    Use getOpenAction()
    com.qoppa.pdf.TextPosition.getPDFQuadrilateral()
    replaced by getPDFQuadrilaterals().
    com.qoppa.pdf.SigningInformation.getPrivateKey() 
    com.qoppa.pdf.TextPosition.getQuadrilateral()
    replaced by getViewQuadrilaterals().
    com.qoppa.pdf.TextPosition.getQuadrilaterals()
    replaced with getViewQuadrilaterals().
    com.qoppa.pdf.TextSelection.getQuadrilaterals()
    replaced by getPDFQuadrilaterals().
    com.qoppa.pdf.TextPosition.getSelectionShape()
    replaced by getViewSelectionShape().
    com.qoppa.pdf.TextSelection.getSelectionShape()
    replaced by getViewSelectionShape().
    com.qoppa.pdf.TextPosition.getViewQuadrilateral()
    replaced by getViewQuadrilaterals().
    com.qoppa.pdf.actions.ISubmitActionEmailHandler.handleEmail(String, File, String)
    Use handleEmail(String toAddress, File tmpFile, String extension, String subject, String body) instead.
    com.qoppa.pdf.PDFRenderHints.isImageSmoothReduction()
    This flag is not used in rendering anymore.
    com.qoppa.pdf.PDFRenderHints.setImageSmoothReduction(boolean)
    This flag is not used in rendering anymore.
    com.qoppa.pdf.DocumentInfo.setModifiedDate(Date)
    The document's modified date will be set by the library at the time the document is saved.
    com.qoppa.pdfSecure.PDFSecure.setSecurity(String, String, PasswordPermissions, String, int)
    Use PDFSecure.setPasswordPermissions(String, String, PasswordPermissions, String, int) instead.
